Adam Brotman is an entrepreneur with over 25 years of experience leading major tech and consumer brands. He co-founded Forum3 in 2021.
Adam Brotman is co-founder and co-CEO of Forum3. Previously, he was president, chief experience officer, and co-CEO at J.Crew.
